dc:title: Houses of Hospitality
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: States that the Houses of Hospitality supply one of the means to a new social order. Yet it must be created by the people and not the state. Encourages a lay apostolate to take responsibility for the poor and provide a Christian solution to social problems.
